meanings.definition: In a strong and muscular manner.
meanings.sent1: He lifted the heavy box brawnily.
meanings.sent2: She ran brawnily to catch the bus.
meanings.sent3: The little dog tried to bark brawnily at the big dog.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled brawnily through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The blacksmith hammered the metal brawnily into shape.

meanings.sent1: The brawnily man effortlessly carried the bags.
meanings.sent3: The brawnily wrestler hugged his opponent in victory.
meanings.sent4: The brawnily oak tree stood tall in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The brawnily lion roared to assert dominance.
